item.title: What Font Should I Select For My Project in var_year?
item.description: Not That One Unless you really want your readers to remember your article. Research from "The Design Journal" "An International Journal for All Aspects of Design", suggests you, the reader, will remember that title font more accurately. In fact, it was designed to have that effect. Your subscription could not be saved.

item.title: Prices | Build Hello Business | Where can find great deals on websites, graphic design, wordpress, developers, Vancouver, Surrey, Burnaby, West Vancouver?
item.description: Flat Rate Prices We offer flat rate pricing, in Canadian dollars, based on scope of work signed off. See US/CAD exchange rate. See our package deals, or give us a call, drop a note in our form, or throw over an e-mail. We'll get back to you speedily and book you in for a free consultation and quote.
